gw.api.web.embedded

Interface EmbeddedWidgetUpdateHandler


  • public interface EmbeddedWidgetUpdateHandler
    Handler that can be associated with a embedded widget, via the "updateHandler" property. The handler will be called if the the client side of a embedded widget calls gw.api.callServer, passing the id of the embedded widget and a JSON object to process.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JsonObject update(JsonObject json) 

    • Method Detail

      • update

        JsonObject update(JsonObject json)
